title: RBI imposes penalty on Kotak Mahindra Bank, IDFC First Bank, PNB
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has imposed penalties on three major banks - Kotak Mahindra Bank, IDFC First Bank, and Punjab National Bank (PNB) for regulatory violations. Details about the specific violations and penalty amounts are not provided in the source content.
content: The provided content appears to be primarily template text and navigation elements rather than the actual article content about RBI's penalties on the banks. The original news content about the regulatory action against Kotak Mahindra Bank, IDFC First Bank, and Punjab National Bank is not available in the source material.

source.title: RBI imposes penalty on Kotak Mahindra Bank, IDFC First Bank, PNB

## Background

The original article appears to be missing proper content. The source material only contained:

* Template text
* Navigation elements 
* Website structural components

The intended article was meant to cover RBI's regulatory penalties against:

* Kotak Mahindra Bank
* IDFC First Bank
* Punjab National Bank

However, the actual details and specifics of these penalties were not present in the provided content.
